definition: outside (also pr. [wai4 mian5] for this sense)/surface/exterior/external appearance
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Urn on the outside, as well as a city, called East Rochester.
sentences.chinese: 瓮城的外面，还有一座城，叫做东罗城。

sentences.english: Just as if some one was kissing the window all over outside.
sentences.chinese: 就好像有人从外面把窗子吻了个遍。

sentences.english: It was raining cats and dogs outside, so we had to stay at home.
sentences.chinese: 外面大雨滂沱，我们只好呆在家里。

sentences.english: The boy took one sip of the wine and spat it out.
sentences.chinese: 孩子吃掉了药丸外面的糖衣，却把药心吐了出来。

sentences.english: If you had stayed out all night in the snow,you might have frozen to death.
sentences.chinese: 你要是在外面的雪地里呆上一晚准会冻死。

sentences.english: He slipped into his coat and went out.
sentences.chinese: 他敏捷地套上外衣，跑到外面去了。

sentences.english: When you peep out the successful smiling face.
sentences.chinese: 当你外面偷看时成功微笑的脸。

sentences.english: He went outside the walls, sat under a shady plant and sulked.
sentences.chinese: 他走到围墙外面，站在一棵荫凉的植物下生气。

sentences.english: Outside the shoe store. Near the cafe.
sentences.chinese: 但是今天我又看到他，在鞋店外面，咖啡厅附近。

sentences.english: His body was buried in snow, but his head was sticking out.
sentences.chinese: 他的身体被大雪掩埋，但是头部还露在外面。

sentences.english: SUSAN: I didn't realize anyone was gonna be out here, I just sorta rolled outta bed.
sentences.chinese: 我没想到外面会有人，我只是裹点什么起了床。

sentences.english: After dinner, the table is cleared and moved outside and mattresses laid down.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐后矮桌清理干净并移到外面，地上铺上了床垫。

sentences.english: She ran outside and danced in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 她跑到外面，在雪地里跳起了舞。

sentences.english: If they were built toward the outside.
sentences.chinese: 要是这些东西都建在外面的话。

sentences.english: "I love the West, " she said. Her eyes were shining softly. She looked away and out the train window.
sentences.chinese: 她说，两眼流露着柔柔的光，撇过头望车窗的外面。

sentences.english: I try to bring some of the outside in.
sentences.chinese: 我尝试着将外面的阳光带回家。

definition: outside/outer surface/abroad/place other than one's home
to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
